title: Project-Based Leadership Course Integrating Backward Design and Lateral Thinking for Creative Thinking Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Scientific research methodologies and introductory leadership knowledge
context.additional_context: A creative problem-solving competency enhancement program for science managers/leaders conducted in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can propose creative solutions to science-related problems by applying three or more lateral thinking techniques over four weeks.
Learners can establish specific implementation plans by backtracking project goals according to the backward design model.
Learners can improve their creative thinking processes (divergent/convergent thinking) with over 80% participation through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
